author: Sarah Young, Sarah Young
title: Captain Tom Moore: How to donate to 99-year-old veteran's NHS fundraising campaign
description: Army veteran has raised more than £12m for the NHS so far
content:
Army veteran Captain Tom Moore has helped to raise more than £12m for the NHS by walking 100 lengths of his back garden.
The 99-year-old, who served in India and Burma, originally planned to finish his challenge by 30 April the day on which he turns 100 year… [+9183 chars]
